TEXT.TITLE: EASTMAN KODAK <EK> SELLS 25 MLN DLRS OF NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Eastman Kodak Co is raising 25 mln dlrs through an offering of notes due 1997, said sole underwriter Morgan Stanley and Co Inc. The notes have a 7-1/2 pct coupon and an initial offering price of 99.625 to yield 7.34 pct, or 20 basis points over five-year Treasury notes. Morgan said the notes will be reoffered to investors at variable prices. Non-callable for life, the issue is rated Aaa by Moody's Investors Service Inc and AA by Standard and Poor's Corp. Investors can sell the notes back to the company in 1992. Reuter
